ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:56:32 [Issue ID 4000-42083] urn:comicvine:4000-42083 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 02:14:14. [Issue ID 58447]
ComicInfo.Summary:
An increasingly alienated Swamp Thing gets some ominous hints about his future from an eerie group of half-alive Cajun tree-men. Meanwhile, Nightmaster faces what may be his last stand against the warlocks who have destroyed his home dimension.
The issue features the various sword and sorcery characters of DC in a story which is completed in the following issue and retcons them to be being mental constructs of Nightmaster. The retconn was poorly received and was ignored by later writers.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-07-23 07:38:38. [CVDB42083]

ComicInfo.Title: Trees of Knowledge
